dt-option.name: searchBuilder.columns
dt-option.summary: Restrict which columns can be filtered on

type.description: `-type number[]` of the columns that can be filtered. This accepts all of the options of `dt-type column-selector` such as class name selector, jQuery pseudo selects and column index selectors.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchBuilder.columns` option is `true` meaning that as standard all of columns can be filtered on.
dt-option.description: This is useful as it allows restrictions to be made on which data points can be filtered on. For tables with a large amount of columns, this prevents having a large set of options within the `-tag select` element.

example.title: Allow three columns to be filtered on
